alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 8:08PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pinellas County through 845 PM EDT... At 808 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Macdill Air Force Base, or 7 miles northeast of Downtown Saint Petersburg, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Pinellas Park, Downtown Saint Petersburg, Saint Petersburg, St. Petersburg, Macdill Air Force Base, West And East Lealman, Gandy, Bay Pines, Gulfport, Treasure Island, Kenneth City, South Pasadena, Madeira Beach, Tropicana Field, Sawgrass Lake Park, Vinoy Park, Lake Maggiore, Boyd Hill Nature Preserve, and Albert Whitted Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
